messages.subject: No Cable here
messages.msgSnippet: No cable here either....aren t going to spend hard earned money on a bunch of junk either......watch Pbs, mostly, when watching at all on our 12 inch old,
messages.messageBody: No cable here either....aren't going to spend hard earned money on a bunch of junk either......watch Pbs, mostly, when watching at all on our 12 inch old, black & white......Dh.parents.thought they'd do us a favor, and send us one of those huge like 27 inch color...Huge t.v.'s.....his brother was so happy when we gave him a free new T.V....I just didn't want it taking up the whole living room, and being the center of attention.....I'm surprised at the junk that's on the antanae stations at family time, without cable as it is...like we need a better selection of that, and pay more money for it........rent movies occasionally, but that's a whole family activity.  Computer takes up alot of time though....son is inclined to computer, and just a got the new Pajama Sam game.........and in two days has solved all it's various ways of saving the Peace delegates......I like for him to take No computer days..though, when I see he is spending "most " of his time there...we tell him" you better get off before you become a box-head"  I see the corners appearing now.....soon we'll be able to turn you on and off with a remote, or go surfing with his mouse hands......he gets a kick.......feels his forhead to make sure he's not turning into a computer, or television....hehe.......Michelle
